FeatureItem.Name: Band Layout
FeatureItem.Description: You can customize the layout of bands DIRECTLY IN THE [{goto:Bands}Band Designer]. Drag and resize bands to do thi. The main settings that affect the size of bands are:

FeatureItem.Name: Fixed Bands
FeatureItem.Description:
Fixed bands are anchored to the left or right of a view and are not affected by horizontal scrolling.
Allow horizontal scrolling: [{(OptionsView.ColumnAutoWidth=True)}OptionsView.ColumnAutoWidth], [{goto:Bands,Width}Band.Width] property. (You can change the width of bands DIRECTLY IN THE PREVIEW WINDOW).
Anchor a band: [{goto:Bands,Fixed}Band.Fixed] property.
Separator appearance: [FixedLineWidth], [Appearance.FixedLine] properties.

FeatureItem.Name: Column Layout
FeatureItem.Description:
Allow moving columns: [{(OptionsCustomization.AllowColumnMoving=False)}OptionsCustomization.AllowColumnMoving] [{goto:Columns,OptionsColumn.AllowMove}Column.OptionsColumn.AllowMove], [OptionsCustomization.AllowChangeColumnParent] properties.
Allow resizing columns: [{(OptionsCustomization.AllowColumnResizing=False)}OptionsCustomization.AllowColumnResizing] [{goto:Columns,OptionsColumn.AllowSize}Column.OptionsColumn.AllowSize] properties.
Width: [{goto:Columns,MinWidth}Column.MinWidth,] [{goto:Columns,OptionsColumn.FixedWidth}Column.OptionsColumn.FixedWidth] properties.
Best Fit feature: [BestFitMaxRowCount] property.
Column customization menu: [{(OptionsMenu.EnableColumnMenu=False)}OptionsMenu.EnableColumnMenu] option.
Column layout changes notifications: [{ColumnChanged}ColumnChanged], [ColumnWidthChanged] events.

FeatureItem.Name: Band Layout
FeatureItem.Description:
Band reordering: [OptionsCustomization.AllowChangeBandParent], [{goto:Bands,OptionsBand.AllowMove}Band.OptionsBand.AllowMove] properties.
Band width customization: [{goto:Bands,OptionsBand.AllowSize}Band.OptionsBand.AllowSize], [{goto:Bands,MinWidth}Band.MinWidth], [{goto:Bands,OptionsBand.FixedWidth}Band.OptionsBand.FixedWidth] properties.
Band width changed notification: [BandWidthChanged] event.
Band states: [{goto:Bands,OptionsBand.AllowHotTrack}Band.OptionsBand.AllowHotTrack], [{goto:Bands,OptionsBand.AllowPress}Band.OptionsBand.AllowPress] options.

FeatureItem.Name: Band Headers
FeatureItem.Description:
Visibility: [{(OptionsView.ShowBands=False)}OptionsView.ShowBands] property.
Appearance: [Appearance.BandPanel], [{goto:Bands,AppearanceHeader}Band.AppearanceHeader], [Appearance.BandPanelBackground] properties.
Size: [BandPanelRowHeight], [{goto:Bands,RowCount}Band.RowCount], [{goto:Bands,AutoFillDown}Band.AutoFillDown] properties.
Caption: [{goto:Bands,Caption}Band.Caption], [{goto:Bands,OptionsBand.ShowCaption}Band.OptionsBand.ShowCaption] properties.
Image: [Images], [{goto:Bands,ImageIndex}Band.ImageIndex], [{goto:Bands,ImageAlignment}Band.ImageAlignment] properties.
Tooltips: [{(OptionsHint.ShowBandHeaderHints=False)}OptionsHint.ShowBandHeaderHints], [{goto:Bands,ToolTip}Band.ToolTip] properties.

FeatureItem.Name: Customization Form
FeatureItem.Description:
Available via context menu: [{(OptionsMenu.EnableColumnMenu=False)}OptionsMenu.EnableColumnMenu] option.
Content (hidden columns): [{goto:Columns,Visible}Column.Visible], [{goto:Columns,OptionsColumn.ShowInCustomizationForm}Column.OptionsColumn.ShowInCustomizationForm] properties.
Content (hidden bands): [{(OptionsCustomization.ShowBandsInCustomizationForm=False)}OptionsCustomization.ShowBandsInCustomizationForm], [{goto:Bands,Visible}Band.Visible], [{goto:Bands,OptionsBand.ShowInCustomizationForm}Band.OptionsBand.ShowInCustomizationForm] properties.
Column caption when in customization form: [{goto:Columns,CustomizationCaption}Column.CustomizationCaption] property.
Band caption when in customization form: [{goto:Bands,CustomizationCaption}Band.CustomizationCaption] property.
Before customization form is displayed: [ShowCustomizationForm] event.
Hide notification: [HideCustomizationForm].

FeatureItem.Name: View Appearance
FeatureItem.Description: This page provides access to all the settings available for customizing the appearance of this view. You can also access the appearance settings which relate to a particular visual element. See the [{gotoFeature:VE_Main}Visual Elements] section for this purpose.

FeatureItem.Name: Column
FeatureItem.Description:
The main features that control the order, size and appearance of columns are:
Visibility: [{goto:Columns,Visible}Column.Visible].
Size: [{goto:Columns,Width}Column.Width], [{goto:Columns,MinWidth}Column.MinWidth], [{goto:Columns,OptionsColumn.FixedWidth}Column.OptionsColumn.FixedWidth] properties.
Appearance of cells: [{goto:Columns,AppearanceCell}AppearanceCell] property.
Formatting of cells' texts: [{goto:Columns,DisplayFormat}Column.DisplayFormat] property.
Related features: [{gotoFeature:VE_Cells}cells], [{gotoFeature:VE_ColumnHeaders}column headers], [{gotoFeature:Layout_Columns}column layout].
